text: The canton of Quercy-Rouergue is an administrative division of the Tarn-et- Garonne department, in southern France. It was created at the French canton reorganisation which came into effect in March 2015. Its seat is in Septfonds.Décret n° 2014-273 du 27 février 2014 portant délimitation des cantons dans le département de Tarn-et-Garonne It consists of the following communes: #Castanet #Caylus #Cayriech #Cazals #Espinas #Féneyrols #Ginals #Labastide-de-Penne #Lacapelle-Livron #Laguépie #Lapenche #Lavaurette #Loze #Monteils #Mouillac #Parisot #Puylagarde #Puylaroque #Saint-Antonin-Noble-Val #Saint-Cirq #Saint-Georges #Saint-Projet #Septfonds #Varen #Verfeil ==References== Category:Cantons of Tarn-et-Garonne
title: Canton of Quercy-Rouergue
